history.notes: Implemented helper functions with predictable errors and added shim for root import.
Implemented streaming download helper with injectable opener.
Added FileReader utility with predictable FileAccessException wrappers.
Wrapped java.net.http HttpClient with simple GET/POST helpers and predictable errors.
Added CommonJS fetch helpers with optional logging and custom fetch injection.
Implemented HS256 JWT create/verify helpers with base64url utilities.
